original_text: It was cold. So the servants and the officers had made a fire. They were standing around it to make themselves warm. Peter went to stand with them, so that he could make himself warm too.
korean_text: 그 때가 추운 고로 종과 아랫사람들이 불을 피우고 서서 쬐니 베드로도 함께 서서 쬐더라

sentences.original_text: So the servants and the officers had made a fire.

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 불 주위에 서 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Peter went to stand with them,
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로는 그들과 함께 서기 위해 갔습니다,

sentences.original_text: so that he could make himself warm too.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그 역시 따뜻해질 수 있었습니다.
